verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-MNR: as a guest on Sunday 's AM Joy] , [ARG1: race - obsessed MSNBC contributor Jason Johnson] accused former FBI director James Comey of resenting Attorney General Loretta Lynch for being a " black woman boss , " and then went on to accuse Trump administration members of being " terrorists " who " terrorize people into leaving the country " to promote " white nationalism . "
